DOC.brief_summary: There is a growing body of evidence demonstrating that older adults with COPD have important problems with their balance and a high incidence of falls compared to those of a similar age. This research will explore the feasibility and preliminary effects of a tailored 6-month home balance exercise program for reducing falls in older adults with COPD.
DOC.brief_title: Home Balance Pilot for Fall Reduction in COPD
